targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "measurement" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("physical_busy") FROM "cpu_util" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: CPU消耗, 期望CPU(Entitlement), VP数量

targets.query: SELECT mean("run_queue") FROM "kernel" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("real_system") *4096/1024/1024 FROM "memory" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("real_total") *4096/1024/1024 FROM "memory" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

alert.name: 计算内存使用百分比(%) alert

targets.query: SELECT   "busy" FROM "disks" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY "disk_name"

alert.name: 交换空间使用百分比(%) 告警

targets.query: SELECT   "xfers" FROM "disks" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "disk_name"
SELECT "ibytes" FROM "network_interfaces" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "network_interface_name"
SELECT "ipackets" FROM "network_interfaces" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "network_interface_name"
SELECT "opackets" * -1 FROM "network_interfaces" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "network_interface_name"

panels.description: 各类进程占用CPU时间比例(%)

targets.query: SELECT  "ucpu_time" + "scpu_time" FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "processe_name"

panels.title: 各类进程占用CPU时间比例(%)

targets.query: SELECT "used_percent" FROM "filesystems" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "filesystem_name"
SELECT  "real_inuse" FROM "processes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$HOST$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "processe_name"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host" WHERE os = 'AIX' and ( vios_vhost_name =~ /vhost/ or vios_virtual_fcadapter_name =~ /vfc/ )
list.label: Hostname
list.name: HOST
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host" WHERE os = 'AIX' and ( vios_vhost_name =~ /vhost/ or vios_virtual_fcadapter_name =~ /vfc/ )
